name: Chaos Dashboard
description: A data-visualisation website about the worst kind of events of the year. Made with React.

name: A Rogue Like
description: A simple endless fight game made with procedural dungeon generation. Made with Unreal Engine

name: The Last Call
description: A title sequence for an original movie. I modelled and textured the robot, and took Megascan assets in Unreal Engine for the universe

name: A Snowpiercer Scene
description: A small scene made with Blender about the Snowpiercer movie

name: Learn Vulkan
description: A custom renderer made to learn and test Vulkan concepts

name: Cube Beast Editor
description: A voxel-editor running on your desktop and your browser

name: Met ECS
description: An Entity-Component-System library in C++ made to test out the templating langage

name: Mirrors Lasers & Robots
description: A small tower-defense game made in bare C++ with an ECS architecture

name: OpenGL Playground
description: A simple OpenGL renderer with an Entity Component System architecture

name: DirectX 11 Playground
description: A simple DirectX renderer with an Entity Component System architecture

name: Lolimac
description: Lolimac is an event-organisation website made with Angular. You can create, modify and join events made for IMAC students. Synchronisation with calendars is available as well.

name: Which GUI
description: Adaptation of great User Interfaces in games using different technologies

name: Roll Goal
description: Re-creation of a small game across multiple game engines

name: Coffee Conspiration
description: An inner-joke built with webpack and HTML Components. It is a game/story experience dedicated to surprise its audience and play with conspiration tropes.

description: Point'n click game made with Unity for the Digital Art Jam 2

name: Infotrafic.com
description: A realtime-trafic map visualizer made for my employer Infotrafic. It is built with Angular and uses Node as backend. Uses progressive web app (PWA) structure and conventions.

name: Kanaga Wave
description: A multiplayer game made in Unity during the Global Game Jam 2017
